name: Do-San
meaning: Do San is the pseudonym of the patriot Ahn Chang-Ho (1876-1938). The 24 movements represent his entire life which he devoted to furthering the education of Korea and its independence movement.

moves.title: Parallel Ready Stance
moves.description: Start position.

moves.title: High outer forearm side block
moves.description: Turn 90° left to 9 o'clock into left walking stance with high outer forearm side block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok nopunde yop makgi

moves.title: Middle front punch
moves.description: Stay in left walking stance. Middle front punch.

moves.title: High outer forearm side block
moves.description: Centre point turn right 180° to 3 o'clock into right walking stance. High outer forearm side block.
moves.korean: gunnun so bakat palmok nopunde yop makgi

moves.title: Middle front punch
moves.description: Stay in right walking stance. Middle front punch.

moves.title: Knife-hand guarding block
moves.description: Turn 90° left to 12 o'clock into right l-stance. Middle knife-hand guarding block.
moves.korean: niunja so sonkal kaunde daebi makgi

moves.title: Walking Stance Thrust
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance. Middle straight fingertip thrust.

moves.title: Walking Stance Strike
moves.description: Turn 360° left to face 12 o'clock into left walking stance. High backfist side strike.

moves.title: Walking Stance Strike
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance. High backfist side strike.

moves.title: Walking Stance Block
moves.description: Pivot 270° left to 3 o'clock into left walking stance. High outer forearm side block.

moves.title: Walking Stance Punch
moves.description: Stay in left walking stance. Middle front punch.

moves.title: Walking Stance Block
moves.description: Centre point turn right 180° to 3 o'clock into right walking stance. High outer forearm side block.

moves.title: Walking Stance Punch
moves.description: Stay in right walking stance. Middle front punch.

moves.title: Walking Stance Block
moves.description: Bring the left foot in then out to face  5 o'clock into left walking stance with high outer forearm wedging block.

moves.title: Snap Kick
moves.description: Stay in place. Right middle front snap kick.

moves.title: Walking Stance Punch
moves.description: Land kicking foot in front into right walking stance with middle front punch.

moves.title: Walking Stance Punch
moves.description: Stay in right walking stance with middle reverse punch.

moves.title: Walking Stance Block
moves.description: bring the right foot in and then step out to face 7 o'clock in to a right walking stance with high wedging block.

moves.title: Snap Kick
moves.description: Stay in place. Left middle front snap kick.

moves.title: Walking Stance Punch
moves.description: Land kicking foot in front into left walking stance with middle front punch.

moves.title: Walking Stance Punch
moves.description: Stay in left walking stance with middle reverse punch.

moves.title: Walking Stance Block
moves.description: Pivot left on the right foot to face 6 o'clock into left walking stance. Rising outer forearm block.

moves.title: Walking Stance Block
moves.description: Step forward to 6 o'clock into right walking stance. Rising outer forearm block.

moves.title: Sitting Stance Strike
moves.description: Turn 270° left to face 9 o'clock into sitting stance with left nifehand side strike.

moves.title: Sitting Stance Strike
moves.description: Step foot-to-foot to face 3 o'clock into sitting stance with right knifehand side strike.

moves.title: Parallel Ready Stance
moves.description: Move the right foot to return to parallel ready stance facing 12 o'clock.
